Package com.example.plannet.Event

Class LotterySystem

java.lang.Object
com.example.plannet.Event.LotterySystem
public class LotterySystem extends Object
lottery system class which selects entrants from a draw and sends notifications

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<EntrantProfile>
    drawParticipants(List<EntrantProfile> pendingWaitlist, int numToDraw)
    Performs a lottery draw to randomly select a number of participants from the pending waitlist.
    void
    processSelectedParticipants(EventWaitlistPending pendingWaitlist, EventWaitlistChosen chosenWaitlist, List<EntrantProfile> selectedEntrants)
    Processes selected participants by moving them from the pending waitlist to the chosen waitlist.
    EntrantProfile
    redrawParticipant(EventWaitlistPending pendingWaitlist, EventWaitlistChosen chosenWaitlist)
    After the previous participant reject the event, we redraw a new participant from the waiting list We repeat the same step: Selects a new participant from the pending waitlist and moves them to the chosen list.
    void
    rejectParticipant(EventWaitlistChosen chosenWaitlist, EventWaitlistRejected rejectedWaitlist, EntrantProfile entrant)
    If a participant who was previously chosen want to reject the event, we remove him from the chosen list to the rejected list

    • LotterySystem

      public LotterySystem()

  • Method Details

    • drawParticipants

      public List<EntrantProfile> drawParticipants(List<EntrantProfile> pendingWaitlist, int numToDraw)
      Performs a lottery draw to randomly select a number of participants from the pending waitlist. Returns a list of profiles that are selected.
      Parameters:
      pendingWaitlist - A list of EntrantProfiles to draw from
      numToDraw - The number of participants to draw
      Returns:
      A list of EntrantProfiles that are selected

    • processSelectedParticipants

      public void processSelectedParticipants(EventWaitlistPending pendingWaitlist, EventWaitlistChosen chosenWaitlist, List<EntrantProfile> selectedEntrants)
      Processes selected participants by moving them from the pending waitlist to the chosen waitlist.

    • rejectParticipant

      public void rejectParticipant(EventWaitlistChosen chosenWaitlist, EventWaitlistRejected rejectedWaitlist, EntrantProfile entrant)
      If a participant who was previously chosen want to reject the event, we remove him from the chosen list to the rejected list

    • redrawParticipant

      public EntrantProfile redrawParticipant(EventWaitlistPending pendingWaitlist, EventWaitlistChosen chosenWaitlist)
      After the previous participant reject the event, we redraw a new participant from the waiting list We repeat the same step: Selects a new participant from the pending waitlist and moves them to the chosen list. In the end, we return the new participant list or null if no participants are left in the pending list
